name: @recordreplay/playwright-config
description: Configuration utilities for using the Replay browsers with playwright

scripts.prepublishOnly: node -e 'require("fs").existsSync("./index.js") || (console.error("\x1b[31mError:\x1b[37m Wrong Directory. Publish from the dist/ directory instead\n"),process.exit(1))'
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && tsc && cp package.json README.md dist/
